__TOC__

UBports is a team of Developers and a meeting place for developers that wish to port Ubuntu Touch to as many devices as possible, This is a place where Developers can talk to other developers and learn from each other and help push ubuntu to more devices as teams, or by yourself but with community support if you wish.

=== Devices ===

See <nowiki>[[http://devices.ubports.com|devices.ubports.com]]</nowiki>
